fields.description:
Description:
"B2" button missing it's border after tapping "Click me" button twice.

This is not regression,occurs on 2.1.4, 2.1.3

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Go to Controls - Button States - "B2" button's border is seen.
3. Tap "Click me" button twice

Actual result:
Button's B2 border is missing.

Expected result:
The border should be seen.
fields.summary: Kitchen Sink: Button States - Missing "B2" button border
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.0.201211261800
Titanium SDK, build: 3.0.0.v20121121161553
Devices:
iPad mini iOS 6.0.1
iPad4 iOS 6.0
iPhone5 iOS 6.0

comments.body:
The problem exist with release 3.1.0 and 3.0.2

tested on

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201302191606
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
